message: We all need some loading gif images. what if you can have it only with css? Yeah Fully transparent and you can change the color with CSS :) Enjoy my snippet ;)
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
Still cannot trust transition and rotation of CSS3, it's not fully supported only in modern browser and not all of them.
Beside that, the animation still not that smooth due to the repainting calls and antialiasing alpha pixel on the image ... ya 3m, GIF we raya7 demaghak :P .
Allah yer7amo el FoooLash :) .
